title: Tools for automatic proof building
content: The results in this section are mostly meant for being used by automatic proof building programs. As a result, they might appear less useful or meaningful than others to human beings.

blocks.name: efald2
blocks.content: A proof by contradiction. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 15-Sep-2017.)

blocks.name: notbinot1
blocks.content: Simplification rule of negation across a biimplication. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 15-Sep-2017.)

blocks.name: bicontr
blocks.content: Biimplication of its own negation is a contradiction. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 15-Sep-2017.)

blocks.name: impor
blocks.content: An equivalent formula for implying a disjunction. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 15-Sep-2017.)

blocks.name: orfa
blocks.content: The falsum ` F. ` can be removed from a disjunction. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 15-Sep-2017.)

blocks.name: notbinot2
blocks.content: Commutation rule between negation and biimplication. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 15-Sep-2017.)

blocks.name: biimpor
blocks.content: A rewriting rule for biimplication. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 15-Sep-2017.)

blocks.name: unitresl
blocks.content: A lemma for Conjunctive Normal Form unit propagation, in deduction form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 15-Sep-2017.)

blocks.name: unitresr
blocks.content: A lemma for Conjunctive Normal Form unit propagation, in deduction form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 15-Sep-2017.)

blocks.name: orfa1
blocks.content: Add a contradicting disjunct to an antecedent. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 15-Sep-2017.)

blocks.name: orfa2
blocks.content: Remove a contradicting disjunct from an antecedent. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 15-Sep-2017.)

blocks.name: bifald
blocks.content: Infer the equivalence to a contradiction from a negation, in deduction form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 15-Sep-2017.)

blocks.name: orsild
blocks.content: A lemma for not-or-not elimination, in deduction form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 15-Sep-2017.)

blocks.name: orsird
blocks.content: A lemma for not-or-not elimination, in deduction form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 15-Sep-2017.)

blocks.name: cnf1dd
blocks.content: A lemma for Conjunctive Normal Form unit propagation, in double deduction form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 19-Mar-2018.)

blocks.name: cnf2dd
blocks.content: A lemma for Conjunctive Normal Form unit propagation, in double deduction form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 19-Mar-2018.)

blocks.name: cnfn1dd
blocks.content: A lemma for Conjunctive Normal Form unit propagation, in double deduction form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 19-Mar-2018.)

blocks.name: cnfn2dd
blocks.content: A lemma for Conjunctive Normal Form unit propagation, in double deduction form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 19-Mar-2018.)

blocks.name: or32dd
blocks.content: A rearrangement of disjuncts, in double deduction form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 19-Mar-2018.)

blocks.name: notornotel1
blocks.content: A lemma for not-or-not elimination, in deduction form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 19-Mar-2018.)

blocks.name: notornotel2
blocks.content: A lemma for not-or-not elimination, in deduction form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 19-Mar-2018.)

blocks.name: contrd
blocks.content: A proof by contradiction, in deduction form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 19-Mar-2018.)

blocks.name: an12i
blocks.content: An inference from commuting operands in a chain of conjunctions. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 22-May-2019.)

blocks.name: exmid2
blocks.content: An excluded middle law. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 23-May-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm exmid2(wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3) {
  |- wi(wa(w0, w1), w2)
  -| wi(wa(w3, w0), w2)
  -| wi(wa(wn(w3), w1), w2)
} = {
  pm2.61dan(wa(w0, w1), w2, w3)
  syl(wa(wa(w0, w1), w3), w2, wa(w3, w0))
  ancoms(wa(w0, w1), w3, wa(w3, w0))
  anim2i(w3, wa(w0, w1), w0)
  simpl(w0, w1)
  syl(wa(wa(w0, w1), wn(w3)), w2, wa(wn(w3), w1))
  ancoms(wa(w0, w1), wn(w3), wa(wn(w3), w1))
  anim2i(wn(w3), wa(w0, w1), w1)
  simpr(w0, w1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm exmid2(wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((w0 ‚àß w1)‚Üí w2)
  ‚ä£ ((w3 ‚àß w0)‚Üí w2)
  ‚ä£ ((¬¨ w3 ‚àß w1)‚Üí w2)
} = {
  pm2.61dan((w0 ‚àß w1), w2, w3)
  syl(((w0 ‚àß w1)‚àß w3), w2, (w3 ‚àß w0))
  ancoms((w0 ‚àß w1), w3, (w3 ‚àß w0))
  anim2i(w3, (w0 ‚àß w1), w0)
  simpl(w0, w1)
  syl(((w0 ‚àß w1)‚àß ¬¨ w3), w2, (¬¨ w3 ‚àß w1))
  ancoms((w0 ‚àß w1), ¬¨ w3, (¬¨ w3 ‚àß w1))
  anim2i(¬¨ w3, (w0 ‚àß w1), w1)
  simpr(w0, w1)
}

blocks.name: selconj
blocks.content: An inference for selecting one of a list of conjuncts. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 23-May-2019.)

blocks.name: truconj
blocks.content: Add true as a conjunct. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 23-May-2019.)

blocks.name: orel
blocks.content: An inference for disjunction elimination. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 24-May-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm orel(wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4, wff w5) {
  |- wi(wa(w0, wa(w1, w2)), w3)
  -| wi(wa(w4, w1), w3)
  -| wi(wa(w5, w2), w3)
  -| wi(w0, wo(w4, w5))
} = {
  mpjaodan(wa(w0, wa(w1, w2)), w3, w4, w5)
  sylan(wa(w0, wa(w1, w2)), w4, w3, w1)
  simprl(w0, w1, w2)
  ancoms(w1, w4, w3)
  sylan(wa(w0, wa(w1, w2)), w5, w3, w2)
  simprr(w0, w1, w2)
  ancoms(w2, w5, w3)
  adantr(w0, wa(w1, w2), wo(w4, w5))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm orel(wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4, wff w5) {
  ‚ä¢ ((w0 ‚àß(w1 ‚àß w2))‚Üí w3)
  ‚ä£ ((w4 ‚àß w1)‚Üí w3)
  ‚ä£ ((w5 ‚àß w2)‚Üí w3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(w4 ‚à® w5))
} = {
  mpjaodan((w0 ‚àß(w1 ‚àß w2)), w3, w4, w5)
  sylan((w0 ‚àß(w1 ‚àß w2)), w4, w3, w1)
  simprl(w0, w1, w2)
  ancoms(w1, w4, w3)
  sylan((w0 ‚àß(w1 ‚àß w2)), w5, w3, w2)
  simprr(w0, w1, w2)
  ancoms(w2, w5, w3)
  adantr(w0, (w1 ‚àß w2), (w4 ‚à® w5))
}

blocks.name: negel
blocks.content: An inference for negation elimination. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 24-May-2019.)

blocks.name: botel
blocks.content: An inference for bottom elimination. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 24-May-2019.)

blocks.name: tradd
blocks.content: Add top ad a conjunct. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 24-May-2019.)

blocks.name: sbtru
blocks.content: Substitution does not change truth. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 24-May-2019.)

blocks.name: sbfal
blocks.content: Substitution does not change falsity. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 24-May-2019.)

blocks.name: sbcani
blocks.content: Distribution of class substitution over conjunction, in inference form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 27-May-2019.)

blocks.name: sbcori
blocks.content: Distribution of class substitution over disjunction, in inference form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 27-May-2019.)

blocks.name: sbcimi
blocks.content: Distribution of class substitution over implication, in inference form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 27-May-2019.)

blocks.name: sbcni
blocks.content: Move class substitution inside a negation, in inference form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 27-May-2019.)

blocks.name: sbali
blocks.content: Discard class substitution in a universal quantification when substituting the quantified variable, in inference form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 27-May-2019.)

blocks.name: sbexi
blocks.content: Discard class substitution in an existential quantification when substituting the quantified variable, in inference form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 27-May-2019.)

blocks.name: sbcalf
blocks.content: Move universal quantifier in and out of class substitution, with an explicit non-free variable condition. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 29-May-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm sbcalf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wal(s1, w0)), wal(s1, wsbc(s0, c0, w0)))
  -| wnfc(s1, c0)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  3bitri(wsbc(s0, c0, wal(s1, w0)), wal(s1, wsbc(s0, c0, w0)), wsbc(s0, c0, wal(hs0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0))), wal(hs0, wsbc(s0, c0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0))))
  sbcbii(s0, c0, wal(s1, w0), wal(hs0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0)))
  sb8(s1, hs0, w0)
  nfv(hs0, w0)
  sbcal(s0, hs0, c0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0))
  cbvalv1(hs0, s1, wsbc(s0, c0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0)), wsbc(s0, c0, w0))
  nfsbc(s1, s0, c0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0))
  nfs1v(s1, hs0, w0)
  nfv(hs0, wsbc(s0, c0, w0))
  sbcbidv(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wsb(hs0, s1, w0), w0)
  sbequ12r(hs0, s1, w0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(wsbc(s0, c0, w0))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sbcalf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ ([c0 / s0]‚àÄ(s1, w0)‚Üî ‚àÄ(s1,[c0 / s0]w0))
  ‚ä£ F/(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
} = {
  3bitri([c0 / s0]‚àÄ(s1, w0), ‚àÄ(s1,[c0 / s0]w0), [c0 / s0]‚àÄ(hs0,[hs0 / s1]w0), ‚àÄ(hs0,[c0 / s0][hs0 / s1]w0))
  sbcbii(s0, c0, ‚àÄ(s1, w0), ‚àÄ(hs0,[hs0 / s1]w0))
  sb8(s1, hs0, w0)
  nfv(hs0, w0)
  sbcal(s0, hs0, c0, [hs0 / s1]w0)
  cbvalv1(hs0, s1, [c0 / s0][hs0 / s1]w0, [c0 / s0]w0)
  nfsbc(s1, s0, c0, [hs0 / s1]w0)
  nfs1v(s1, hs0, w0)
  nfv(hs0, [c0 / s0]w0)
  sbcbidv(s0, c0, hs0 = s1, [hs0 / s1]w0, w0)
  sbequ12r(hs0, s1, w0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w([c0 / s0]w0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}

blocks.name: sbcexf
blocks.content: Move existential quantifier in and out of class substitution, with an explicit non-free variable condition. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 29-May-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm sbcexf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wex(s1, w0)), wex(s1, wsbc(s0, c0, w0)))
  -| wnfc(s1, c0)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  3bitri(wsbc(s0, c0, wex(s1, w0)), wex(s1, wsbc(s0, c0, w0)), wsbc(s0, c0, wex(hs0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0))), wex(hs0, wsbc(s0, c0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0))))
  sbcbii(s0, c0, wex(s1, w0), wex(hs0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0)))
  sb8e(s1, hs0, w0)
  nfv(hs0, w0)
  sbcex2(s0, hs0, c0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0))
  cbvexv1(hs0, s1, wsbc(s0, c0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0)), wsbc(s0, c0, w0))
  nfsbc(s1, s0, c0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0))
  nfs1v(s1, hs0, w0)
  nfv(hs0, wsbc(s0, c0, w0))
  sbcbidv(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wsb(hs0, s1, w0), w0)
  sbequ12r(hs0, s1, w0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(wsbc(s0, c0, w0))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sbcexf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ ([c0 / s0]‚àÉ(s1, w0)‚Üî ‚àÉ(s1,[c0 / s0]w0))
  ‚ä£ F/(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
} = {
  3bitri([c0 / s0]‚àÉ(s1, w0), ‚àÉ(s1,[c0 / s0]w0), [c0 / s0]‚àÉ(hs0,[hs0 / s1]w0), ‚àÉ(hs0,[c0 / s0][hs0 / s1]w0))
  sbcbii(s0, c0, ‚àÉ(s1, w0), ‚àÉ(hs0,[hs0 / s1]w0))
  sb8e(s1, hs0, w0)
  nfv(hs0, w0)
  sbcex2(s0, hs0, c0, [hs0 / s1]w0)
  cbvexv1(hs0, s1, [c0 / s0][hs0 / s1]w0, [c0 / s0]w0)
  nfsbc(s1, s0, c0, [hs0 / s1]w0)
  nfs1v(s1, hs0, w0)
  nfv(hs0, [c0 / s0]w0)
  sbcbidv(s0, c0, hs0 = s1, [hs0 / s1]w0, w0)
  sbequ12r(hs0, s1, w0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w([c0 / s0]w0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}

blocks.name: sbcalfi
blocks.content: Move universal quantifier in and out of class substitution, with an explicit non-free variable condition and in inference form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 30-May-2019.)

blocks.name: sbcexfi
blocks.content: Move existential quantifier in and out of class substitution, with an explicit non-free variable condition and in inference form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 30-May-2019.)

blocks.name: spsbcdi
blocks.content: A lemma for eliminating a universal quantifier, in inference form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 30-May-2019.)

blocks.name: alrimii
blocks.content: A lemma for introducing a universal quantifier, in inference form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 30-May-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm alrimii(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(w0, wal(s0, w1))
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wi(w0, w2)
  -| wb(wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w1), w2)
  -| wnf(s1, w1)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  sylib(w0, wal(s0, w1), wal(s1, wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w1)))
  alrimi(s1, w0, wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w1))
  sylibr(w0, wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w1), w2)
  cbvalv1(s1, s0, wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w1), w1)
  nfsbc1v(s0, cv(s1), w1)
  sbceq2a(s0, cv(s1), w1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm alrimii(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí ‚àÄ(s0, w1))
  ‚ä£ F/(s1, w0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí w2)
  ‚ä£ ([s1 / s0]w1 ‚Üî w2)
  ‚ä£ F/(s1, w1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
} = {
  sylib(w0, ‚àÄ(s0, w1), ‚àÄ(s1,[s1 / s0]w1))
  alrimi(s1, w0, [s1 / s0]w1)
  sylibr(w0, [s1 / s0]w1, w2)
  cbvalv1(s1, s0, [s1 / s0]w1, w1)
  nfsbc1v(s0, s1, w1)
  sbceq2a(s0, s1, w1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}

blocks.name: spesbcdi
blocks.content: A lemma for introducing an existential quantifier, in inference form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 30-May-2019.)

blocks.name: exlimddvf
blocks.content: A lemma for eliminating an existential quantifier. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 30-May-2019.)

blocks.name: exlimddvfi
blocks.content: A lemma for eliminating an existential quantifier, in inference form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 31-May-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm exlimddvfi(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4) {
  |- wi(wa(w0, w1), w2)
  -| wi(w0, wex(s0, w3))
  -| wnf(s1, w3)
  -| wnf(s1, w1)
  -| wb(wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w3), w4)
  -| wi(wa(w4, w1), w2)
  -| wnf(s1, w2)
} = {
  exlimddvf(s1, w0, w1, w2, wsb(s1, s0, w3))
  sylib(w0, wex(s1, wsb(s1, s0, w3)), wex(s0, w3))
  sb8e(s0, s1, w3)
  sylanb(wsb(s1, s0, w3), w1, w2, w4)
  bitri(wsb(s1, s0, w3), w4, wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w3))
  sbsbc(s1, s0, w3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm exlimddvfi(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((w0 ‚àß w1)‚Üí w2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0, w3))
  ‚ä£ F/(s1, w3)
  ‚ä£ F/(s1, w1)
  ‚ä£ ([s1 / s0]w3 ‚Üî w4)
  ‚ä£ ((w4 ‚àß w1)‚Üí w2)
  ‚ä£ F/(s1, w2)
} = {
  exlimddvf(s1, w0, w1, w2, [s1 / s0]w3)
  sylib(w0, ‚àÉ(s1,[s1 / s0]w3), ‚àÉ(s0, w3))
  sb8e(s0, s1, w3)
  sylanb([s1 / s0]w3, w1, w2, w4)
  bitri([s1 / s0]w3, w4, [s1 / s0]w3)
  sbsbc(s1, s0, w3)
}

blocks.name: sbceq1ddi
blocks.content: A lemma for eliminating inequality, in inference form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 31-May-2019.)

blocks.name: sbccom2lem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ sbccom2 . (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 31-May-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm sbccom2lem(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c1, w0)), wsbc(s1, csb(s0, c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, w0)))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  3bitr4i(wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c1, w0)), wsbc(s1, csb(s0, c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, w0)), wex(s1, wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wa(wceq(cv(s1), c1), w0)))), wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s1), csb(s0, c0, c1)), wsbc(s0, c0, w0))))
  exbii(s1, wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wa(wceq(cv(s1), c1), w0))), wa(wceq(cv(s1), csb(s0, c0, c1)), wsbc(s0, c0, w0)))
  3bitr3i(wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wa(wceq(cv(s1), c1), w0))), wa(wceq(cv(s1), csb(s0, c0, c1)), wsbc(s0, c0, w0)), wsbc(s0, c0, wa(wceq(cv(s1), c1), w0)), wa(wsbc(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wsbc(s0, c0, w0)))
  sbcan(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c1), w0)
  sbc5(s0, c0, wa(wceq(cv(s1), c1), w0))
  anbi1i(wsbc(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wsbc(s0, c0, w0), wceq(cv(s1), csb(s0, c0, c1)))
  sbceqi(s0, c0, cv(s1), c1, cv(s1), csb(s0, c0, c1))
  csbconstgi(s0, s1, c0)
  eqid(csb(s0, c0, c1))
  bitri(wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c1, w0)), wex(s1, wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wa(wceq(cv(s1), c1), w0)))), wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s1), c1), w0)))))
  bitri(wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c1, w0)), wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s1), c1), w0)))), wsbc(s0, c0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s1), c1), w0))))
  sbcbii(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c1, w0), wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s1), c1), w0)))
  sbc5(s1, c1, w0)
  sbc5(s0, c0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s1), c1), w0)))
  bitri(wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s1), c1), w0)))), wex(s1, wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wa(wceq(cv(s1), c1), w0)))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wa(wceq(cv(s1), c1), w0)))))
  exbii(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s1), c1), w0))), wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wa(wceq(cv(s1), c1), w0))))
  bicomi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s1), c1), w0))), wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wa(wceq(cv(s1), c1), w0))))
  19.42v(s1, wceq(cv(s0), c0), wa(wceq(cv(s1), c1), w0))
  excom(s0, s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wa(wceq(cv(s1), c1), w0)))
  sbc5(s1, csb(s0, c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, w0))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diff.csb.s(s1, s0, c0, c1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sbccom2lem(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ ([c0 / s0][c1 / s1]w0 ‚Üî[[c0 / s0]c1 / s1][c0 / s0]w0)
  ‚ä£ c0 ‚àà ùïå
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  3bitr4i([c0 / s0][c1 / s1]w0, [[c0 / s0]c1 / s1][c0 / s0]w0, ‚àÉ(s1, ‚àÉ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚àß(s1 = c1 ‚àß w0)))), ‚àÉ(s1,(s1 =[c0 / s0]c1 ‚àß[c0 / s0]w0)))
  exbii(s1, ‚àÉ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚àß(s1 = c1 ‚àß w0))), (s1 =[c0 / s0]c1 ‚àß[c0 / s0]w0))
  3bitr3i(‚àÉ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚àß(s1 = c1 ‚àß w0))), (s1 =[c0 / s0]c1 ‚àß[c0 / s0]w0), [c0 / s0](s1 = c1 ‚àß w0), ([c0 / s0]s1 = c1 ‚àß[c0 / s0]w0))
  sbcan(s0, c0, s1 = c1, w0)
  sbc5(s0, c0, (s1 = c1 ‚àß w0))
  anbi1i([c0 / s0]s1 = c1, [c0 / s0]w0, s1 =[c0 / s0]c1)
  sbceqi(s0, c0, s1, c1, s1, [c0 / s0]c1)
  csbconstgi(s0, s1, c0)
  eqid([c0 / s0]c1)
  bitri([c0 / s0][c1 / s1]w0, ‚àÉ(s1, ‚àÉ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚àß(s1 = c1 ‚àß w0)))), ‚àÉ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s1,(s1 = c1 ‚àß w0)))))
  bitri([c0 / s0][c1 / s1]w0, ‚àÉ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s1,(s1 = c1 ‚àß w0)))), [c0 / s0]‚àÉ(s1,(s1 = c1 ‚àß w0)))
  sbcbii(s0, c0, [c1 / s1]w0, ‚àÉ(s1,(s1 = c1 ‚àß w0)))
  sbc5(s1, c1, w0)
  sbc5(s0, c0, ‚àÉ(s1,(s1 = c1 ‚àß w0)))
  bitri(‚àÉ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s1,(s1 = c1 ‚àß w0)))), ‚àÉ(s1, ‚àÉ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚àß(s1 = c1 ‚àß w0)))), ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,(s0 = c0 ‚àß(s1 = c1 ‚àß w0)))))
  exbii(s0, (s0 = c0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s1,(s1 = c1 ‚àß w0))), ‚àÉ(s1,(s0 = c0 ‚àß(s1 = c1 ‚àß w0))))
  bicomi((s0 = c0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s1,(s1 = c1 ‚àß w0))), ‚àÉ(s1,(s0 = c0 ‚àß(s1 = c1 ‚àß w0))))
  19.42v(s1, s0 = c0, (s1 = c1 ‚àß w0))
  excom(s0, s1, (s0 = c0 ‚àß(s1 = c1 ‚àß w0)))
  sbc5(s1, [c0 / s0]c1, [c0 / s0]w0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diff.csb.s(s1, s0, c0, c1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: sbccom2
blocks.content: Commutative law for double class substitution. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 31-May-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm sbccom2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c1, w0)), wsbc(s1, csb(s0, c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, w0)))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  3bitri(wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c1, w0)), wsbc(s1, csb(s0, c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, w0)), wsbc(hs0, csb(s0, c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w0))), wsbc(hs0, csb(s0, c0, c1), wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), wsbc(s0, c0, w0))))
  bitri(wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c1, w0)), wsbc(hs0, csb(s0, c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w0))), wsbc(hs0, csb(hs1, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w0))))
  3bitri(wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c1, w0)), wsbc(hs0, csb(hs1, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w0))), wsbc(hs1, c0, wsbc(hs0, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1), wsbc(s0, cv(hs1), wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w0)))), wsbc(hs0, csb(hs1, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), wsbc(hs1, c0, wsbc(s0, cv(hs1), wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w0)))))
  3bitri(wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c1, w0)), wsbc(hs1, c0, wsbc(hs0, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1), wsbc(s0, cv(hs1), wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w0)))), wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(hs0, c1, wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w0))), wsbc(hs1, c0, wsbc(s0, cv(hs1), wsbc(hs0, c1, wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w0)))))
  sbcbii(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c1, w0), wsbc(hs0, c1, wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w0)))
  bicomi(wsbc(s1, c1, w0), wsbc(hs0, c1, wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w0)))
  sbcco(hs0, s1, c1, w0)
  bicomi(wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(hs0, c1, wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w0))), wsbc(hs1, c0, wsbc(s0, cv(hs1), wsbc(hs0, c1, wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w0)))))
  sbcco(hs1, s0, c0, wsbc(hs0, c1, wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w0)))
  sbcbii(hs1, c0, wsbc(s0, cv(hs1), wsbc(hs0, c1, wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w0))), wsbc(hs0, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1), wsbc(s0, cv(hs1), wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w0))))
  sbccom2lem(s0, hs0, cv(hs1), c1, wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w0))
  vex(hs1)
  sbccom2lem(hs1, hs0, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1), wsbc(s0, cv(hs1), wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w0)))
  sbcbii(hs0, csb(hs1, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), wsbc(hs1, c0, wsbc(s0, cv(hs1), wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w0))), wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w0)))
  sbcco(hs1, s0, c0, wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w0))
  ax-mp(wb(wsbc(hs0, csb(hs1, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w0))), wsbc(hs0, csb(s0, c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w0)))), wceq(csb(hs1, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), csb(s0, c0, c1)))
  csbco(hs1, s0, c0, c1)
  dfsbcq(hs0, csb(hs1, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), csb(s0, c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w0)))
  sbcbii(hs0, csb(s0, c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w0)), wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), wsbc(s0, c0, w0)))
  sbccom(s0, s1, c0, cv(hs0), w0)
  sbcco(hs0, s1, csb(s0, c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, w0))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(wsbc(hs0, c1, wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w0)))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(hs1))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1))
  diff.hs1.w(wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w0))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(wsbc(s0, c0, w0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sbccom2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ ([c0 / s0][c1 / s1]w0 ‚Üî[[c0 / s0]c1 / s1][c0 / s0]w0)
  ‚ä£ c0 ‚àà ùïå
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  3bitri([c0 / s0][c1 / s1]w0, [[c0 / s0]c1 / s1][c0 / s0]w0, [[c0 / s0]c1 / hs0][c0 / s0][hs0 / s1]w0, [[c0 / s0]c1 / hs0][hs0 / s1][c0 / s0]w0)
  bitri([c0 / s0][c1 / s1]w0, [[c0 / s0]c1 / hs0][c0 / s0][hs0 / s1]w0, [[c0 / hs1][hs1 / s0]c1 / hs0][c0 / s0][hs0 / s1]w0)
  3bitri([c0 / s0][c1 / s1]w0, [[c0 / hs1][hs1 / s0]c1 / hs0][c0 / s0][hs0 / s1]w0, [c0 / hs1][[hs1 / s0]c1 / hs0][hs1 / s0][hs0 / s1]w0, [[c0 / hs1][hs1 / s0]c1 / hs0][c0 / hs1][hs1 / s0][hs0 / s1]w0)
  3bitri([c0 / s0][c1 / s1]w0, [c0 / hs1][[hs1 / s0]c1 / hs0][hs1 / s0][hs0 / s1]w0, [c0 / s0][c1 / hs0][hs0 / s1]w0, [c0 / hs1][hs1 / s0][c1 / hs0][hs0 / s1]w0)
  sbcbii(s0, c0, [c1 / s1]w0, [c1 / hs0][hs0 / s1]w0)
  bicomi([c1 / s1]w0, [c1 / hs0][hs0 / s1]w0)
  sbcco(hs0, s1, c1, w0)
  bicomi([c0 / s0][c1 / hs0][hs0 / s1]w0, [c0 / hs1][hs1 / s0][c1 / hs0][hs0 / s1]w0)
  sbcco(hs1, s0, c0, [c1 / hs0][hs0 / s1]w0)
  sbcbii(hs1, c0, [hs1 / s0][c1 / hs0][hs0 / s1]w0, [[hs1 / s0]c1 / hs0][hs1 / s0][hs0 / s1]w0)
  sbccom2lem(s0, hs0, hs1, c1, [hs0 / s1]w0)
  vex(hs1)
  sbccom2lem(hs1, hs0, c0, [hs1 / s0]c1, [hs1 / s0][hs0 / s1]w0)
  sbcbii(hs0, [c0 / hs1][hs1 / s0]c1, [c0 / hs1][hs1 / s0][hs0 / s1]w0, [c0 / s0][hs0 / s1]w0)
  sbcco(hs1, s0, c0, [hs0 / s1]w0)
  ax-mp(([[c0 / hs1][hs1 / s0]c1 / hs0][c0 / s0][hs0 / s1]w0 ‚Üî[[c0 / s0]c1 / hs0][c0 / s0][hs0 / s1]w0), [c0 / hs1][hs1 / s0]c1 =[c0 / s0]c1)
  csbco(hs1, s0, c0, c1)
  dfsbcq(hs0, [c0 / hs1][hs1 / s0]c1, [c0 / s0]c1, [c0 / s0][hs0 / s1]w0)
  sbcbii(hs0, [c0 / s0]c1, [c0 / s0][hs0 / s1]w0, [hs0 / s1][c0 / s0]w0)
  sbccom(s0, s1, c0, hs0, w0)
  sbcco(hs0, s1, [c0 / s0]c1, [c0 / s0]w0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w([c1 / hs0][hs0 / s1]w0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c([hs1 / s0]c1)
  diff.hs1.w([hs0 / s1]w0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w([c0 / s0]w0)
}

blocks.name: sbccom2f
blocks.content: Commutative law for double class substitution, with nonfree variable condition. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 31-May-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm sbccom2f(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c1, w0)), wsbc(s1, csb(s0, c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, w0)))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wnfc(s1, c0)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  3bitri(wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c1, w0)), wsbc(s1, csb(s0, c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, w0)), wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(hs0, c1, wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w0))), wsbc(hs0, csb(s0, c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w0))))
  sbcbii(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c1, w0), wsbc(hs0, c1, wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w0)))
  bicomi(wsbc(s1, c1, w0), wsbc(hs0, c1, wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w0)))
  sbcco(hs0, s1, c1, w0)
  sbccom2(s0, hs0, c0, c1, wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w0))
  bitri(wsbc(hs0, csb(s0, c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w0))), wsbc(s1, csb(s0, c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, w0)), wsbc(hs0, csb(s0, c0, c1), wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), wsbc(s0, c0, w0))))
  sbcbii(hs0, csb(s0, c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w0)), wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), wsbc(s0, c0, w0)))
  bicomi(wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w0)), wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), wsbc(s0, c0, w0)))
  bitri(wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), wsbc(s0, c0, w0)), wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w0)), wsbc(s0, csb(s1, cv(hs0), c0), wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w0)))
  sbccom2(s1, s0, cv(hs0), c0, w0)
  ax-mp(wb(wsbc(s0, csb(s1, cv(hs0), c0), wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w0)), wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w0))), wceq(csb(s1, cv(hs0), c0), c0))
  csbief(s1, cv(hs0), c0, c0)
  vex(hs0)
  eqidd(c0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))
  dfsbcq(s0, csb(s1, cv(hs0), c0), c0, wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w0))
  sbcco(hs0, s1, csb(s0, c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, w0))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(wsbc(s0, c0, w0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sbccom2f(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ ([c0 / s0][c1 / s1]w0 ‚Üî[[c0 / s0]c1 / s1][c0 / s0]w0)
  ‚ä£ c0 ‚àà ùïå
  ‚ä£ F/(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
} = {
  3bitri([c0 / s0][c1 / s1]w0, [[c0 / s0]c1 / s1][c0 / s0]w0, [c0 / s0][c1 / hs0][hs0 / s1]w0, [[c0 / s0]c1 / hs0][c0 / s0][hs0 / s1]w0)
  sbcbii(s0, c0, [c1 / s1]w0, [c1 / hs0][hs0 / s1]w0)
  bicomi([c1 / s1]w0, [c1 / hs0][hs0 / s1]w0)
  sbcco(hs0, s1, c1, w0)
  sbccom2(s0, hs0, c0, c1, [hs0 / s1]w0)
  bitri([[c0 / s0]c1 / hs0][c0 / s0][hs0 / s1]w0, [[c0 / s0]c1 / s1][c0 / s0]w0, [[c0 / s0]c1 / hs0][hs0 / s1][c0 / s0]w0)
  sbcbii(hs0, [c0 / s0]c1, [c0 / s0][hs0 / s1]w0, [hs0 / s1][c0 / s0]w0)
  bicomi([c0 / s0][hs0 / s1]w0, [hs0 / s1][c0 / s0]w0)
  bitri([hs0 / s1][c0 / s0]w0, [c0 / s0][hs0 / s1]w0, [[hs0 / s1]c0 / s0][hs0 / s1]w0)
  sbccom2(s1, s0, hs0, c0, w0)
  ax-mp(([[hs0 / s1]c0 / s0][hs0 / s1]w0 ‚Üî[c0 / s0][hs0 / s1]w0), [hs0 / s1]c0 = c0)
  csbief(s1, hs0, c0, c0)
  vex(hs0)
  eqidd(c0, s1 = hs0)
  dfsbcq(s0, [hs0 / s1]c0, c0, [hs0 / s1]w0)
  sbcco(hs0, s1, [c0 / s0]c1, [c0 / s0]w0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w([c0 / s0]w0)
}

blocks.name: sbccom2fi
blocks.content: Commutative law for double class substitution, with nonfree variable condition and in inference form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 1-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm sbccom2fi(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c1, w0)), wsbc(s1, c2, w1))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wnfc(s1, c0)
  -| wceq(csb(s0, c0, c1), c2)
  -| wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), w1)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  3bitri(wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c1, w0)), wsbc(s1, c2, w1), wsbc(s1, csb(s0, c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, w0)), wsbc(s1, c2, wsbc(s0, c0, w0)))
  sbccom2f(s0, s1, c0, c1, w0)
  ax-mp(wb(wsbc(s1, csb(s0, c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, w0)), wsbc(s1, c2, wsbc(s0, c0, w0))), wceq(csb(s0, c0, c1), c2))
  dfsbcq(s1, csb(s0, c0, c1), c2, wsbc(s0, c0, w0))
  sbcbii(s1, c2, wsbc(s0, c0, w0), w1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sbccom2fi(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ‚ä¢ ([c0 / s0][c1 / s1]w0 ‚Üî[c2 / s1]w1)
  ‚ä£ c0 ‚àà ùïå
  ‚ä£ F/(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ [c0 / s0]c1 = c2
  ‚ä£ ([c0 / s0]w0 ‚Üî w1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
} = {
  3bitri([c0 / s0][c1 / s1]w0, [c2 / s1]w1, [[c0 / s0]c1 / s1][c0 / s0]w0, [c2 / s1][c0 / s0]w0)
  sbccom2f(s0, s1, c0, c1, w0)
  ax-mp(([[c0 / s0]c1 / s1][c0 / s0]w0 ‚Üî[c2 / s1][c0 / s0]w0), [c0 / s0]c1 = c2)
  dfsbcq(s1, [c0 / s0]c1, c2, [c0 / s0]w0)
  sbcbii(s1, c2, [c0 / s0]w0, w1)
}

blocks.name: csbcom2fi
blocks.content: Commutative law for double class substitution in a class, with nonfree variable condition and in inference form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 4-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm csbcom2fi(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wceq(csb(s0, c0, csb(s1, c1, c2)), csb(s1, c3, c4))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wnfc(s1, c0)
  -| wceq(csb(s0, c0, c1), c3)
  -| wceq(csb(s0, c0, c2), c4)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  eqriv(hs0, csb(s0, c0, csb(s1, c1, c2)), csb(s1, c3, c4))
  3bitri(wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, c0, csb(s1, c1, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s1, c3, c4)), wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), wsbc(s1, c3, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)))
  bitri(wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, c0, csb(s1, c1, c2))), wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s1, c1, c2))))
  abeq2i(hs0, csb(s0, c0, csb(s1, c1, c2)), wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s1, c1, c2))))
  df-csb(s0, hs0, c0, csb(s1, c1, c2))
  sbcbii(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s1, c1, c2)), wsbc(s1, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  abeq2i(hs0, csb(s1, c1, c2), wsbc(s1, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  df-csb(s1, hs0, c1, c2)
  sbccom2fi(s0, s1, c0, c1, c3, wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c4))
  bitr3i(wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, c0, c2)))
  abeq2i(hs0, csb(s0, c0, c2), wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  df-csb(s0, hs0, c0, c2)
  eleq2i(cv(hs0), csb(s0, c0, c2), c4)
  sbcel2(s1, c3, cv(hs0), c4)
  diff.hs0.c(csb(s0, c0, csb(s1, c1, c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(csb(s1, c3, c4))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(csb(s1, c1, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm csbcom2fi(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ [c0 / s0][c1 / s1]c2 =[c3 / s1]c4
  ‚ä£ c0 ‚àà ùïå
  ‚ä£ F/(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ [c0 / s0]c1 = c3
  ‚ä£ [c0 / s0]c2 = c4
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
} = {
  eqriv(hs0, [c0 / s0][c1 / s1]c2, [c3 / s1]c4)
  3bitri(hs0 ‚àà[c0 / s0][c1 / s1]c2, hs0 ‚àà[c3 / s1]c4, [c0 / s0][c1 / s1]hs0 ‚àà c2, [c3 / s1]hs0 ‚àà c4)
  bitri(hs0 ‚àà[c0 / s0][c1 / s1]c2, [c0 / s0][c1 / s1]hs0 ‚àà c2, [c0 / s0]hs0 ‚àà[c1 / s1]c2)
  abeq2i(hs0, [c0 / s0][c1 / s1]c2, [c0 / s0]hs0 ‚àà[c1 / s1]c2)
  df-csb(s0, hs0, c0, [c1 / s1]c2)
  sbcbii(s0, c0, hs0 ‚àà[c1 / s1]c2, [c1 / s1]hs0 ‚àà c2)
  abeq2i(hs0, [c1 / s1]c2, [c1 / s1]hs0 ‚àà c2)
  df-csb(s1, hs0, c1, c2)
  sbccom2fi(s0, s1, c0, c1, c3, hs0 ‚àà c2, hs0 ‚àà c4)
  bitr3i([c0 / s0]hs0 ‚àà c2, hs0 ‚àà c4, hs0 ‚àà[c0 / s0]c2)
  abeq2i(hs0, [c0 / s0]c2, [c0 / s0]hs0 ‚àà c2)
  df-csb(s0, hs0, c0, c2)
  eleq2i(hs0, [c0 / s0]c2, c4)
  sbcel2(s1, c3, hs0, c4)
  diff.hs0.c([c0 / s0][c1 / s1]c2)
  diff.hs0.c([c3 / s1]c4)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c([c1 / s1]c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}
